duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop superior product and disease state knowledge and effectively educate and engage healthcare professionals.

Responsible to meet and strive to exceed all quarterly and annual sales objectives by developing territory specific sales strategies and plans aimed at driving utilization within their defined geography.
Achieve territory sales goals/targets on quarterly and/or annual basis.
Partners with key stakeholders internal/external to help remove barriers to access.
Leverages selling skills to increase overall sales.
